name: smite
description: Zero-debt engineering with 4-flag composable system (speed, scale, quality, team). Features auto-detection, Claude Code Agent Teams integration, token optimization (75% savings), and parallel execution (2-3x speedup).

metadata.description: SMITE v4.0.0 - 4-flag composable system with auto-detection and native Agent Teams integration. Simplified architecture: 5 core plugins + 3 utility plugins.

plugins.name: core
plugins.description: Shared utilities, templates, and validation schemas for all SMITE plugins. Includes shell aliases installation scripts.

plugins.name: implement
plugins.description: Unified implementation with 4-flag composable system: speed, scale, quality, team. Auto-detection, Claude Code Agent Teams integration, and technical subagents. Consolidates all implementation workflows including basics essential commands (commit, note, learn, data, teach).

plugins.name: agents
plugins.description: Multi-agent orchestration system with spec-first workflow - Architect, Builder, Refactor agents. Tech-specific subagents for Next.js, Rust, Python, Go. Includes session renaming automation.

plugins.name: refactor
plugins.description: Unified code refactoring with systematic validation. Modes: quick, full, analyze, review, resolve, verify. Auto-parallel for complex refactors.

plugins.name: explore
plugins.description: Unified code exploration with native grepai integration (75% token savings). Modes: deep, quick, pattern, impact, semantic. Multi-source research capabilities.

plugins.name: shell
plugins.description: Shell aliases for Claude Code (cc, ccc) - cross-platform installation scripts. Works on Windows (PowerShell, cmd), macOS (Bash, Zsh), and Linux.

plugins.name: auto-rename
plugins.description: Intelligent session renaming based on context. Automatically suggests meaningful session names from task content.
